text: The Place to Be is an album by saxophonist Junior Cook recorded in 1988 and released on the SteepleChase label.SteepleChase Productions ApS accessed April 18, 2017Junior Cook Leader Entry accessed April 18, 2017Junior Cook catalog accessed April 18, 2017Jazzlists: Junior Cook discography accessed April 18, 2017 == Track listing == # "Cedar's Blues" (Cedar Walton) – 5:03 # "I Should Have Known" (Mickey Tucker) – 11:33 # "Are You Real" (Benny Golson) – 5:36 # "She Rote" (Charlie Parker) – 4:32 Bonus track on CD release # "Gnid" (Tadd Dameron) – 9:03 Bonus track on CD release # "This Is the Place to Be" (Tucker) – 7:50 # "Over the Rainbow" (Harold Arlen, Yip Harburg) – 8:54 # "Cup Bearer" (Tom McIntosh) – 8:05 == Personnel == *Junior Cook – tenor saxophone *Mickey Tucker – piano *Wayne Dockery – bass *Leroy Williams – drums == References == Category:Junior Cook albums Category:1989 albums Category:SteepleChase Records albums
title: The Place to Be
